name: §a§nHigh Intelligence II
description: Merlings are naturally intelligent due to having to adapt to a constantly changing environment.

text: Just like Sea Turtles, you don't get to start in the water but rather on a Beach and you have to rush over to the waters in order to survive. Just think of it as Survival of the Fittest.
It may take a lot longer than usual for you to spawn in a Beach.
Merlings are able to extract the "hearts" from Guardians and reuse them for other purposes.
You have a §a2§r chance of getting a Heart of the Sea from a Guardian. §aLooting§r does affect this drop rate by §a1%§r per §aLooting§r level.
You have a §a70§r chance of getting a Heart of the Sea from an Elder Guardian. §aLooting§r does affect this drop rate by §a10%§r per §aLooting§r level.
